unarmedAttacks.name: Fist
unarmedAttacks.description: An unarmed attack uses your body rather than a manufactured weapon.

simpleMelee.name: Baton
simpleMelee.description: This reinforced rod is commonly made from metal alloys and designed to strike and parry incoming blows.

simpleMelee.name: Battleglove
simpleMelee.description: These durable gloves fit over a wielder’s hands (or other appendages) and feature weighted plates or spikes over the knuckles.

simpleMelee.name: Knife
simpleMelee.description: Invaluable as both a weapon and a tool, knives come in a variety of shapes, styles, and materials ranging from starmetals to ceramics.

simpleMelee.name: Puzzleblade
simpleMelee.description: This kasathan sword breaks down into interlocking pieces for storage and transport.

simpleMelee.name: Shock pad
simpleMelee.description: This flexible nanocarbon circuit can be installed as an upgrade into gloves, kneepads, or similar appendage protectors to emit a powerful electric shock.

simpleMelee.name: Zero knife
simpleMelee.description: Unfolding like a switchblade, a supercooled chamber within this weapon instantly forms a blade of ice.

martialMelee.name: Aucturnite chakram
martialMelee.description: This bladed hoop is carved from a chunk of aucturnite and sculpted to resemble a planet’s ring.

martialMelee.name: Battle ribbon
martialMelee.description: This sheer nanocarbon ribbon is sharp enough to cut through flesh without interrupting the traditional battle dances that make the weapon famous.

martialMelee.name: Bone scepter
martialMelee.description: This engraved club of solid bone is tempered using material from the void that can drain life energy.

martialMelee.name: Doshko
martialMelee.description: The traditional weapon of the Veskarium, this powered poleaxe features one to three triangular blades forged for both wide overhead swings and tactical parrying.

martialMelee.name: Dueling sword
martialMelee.description: Coming in a variety of styles, these traditional and time-tested weapons have been honed with advanced smithing techniques and modern materials.

martialMelee.name: Fangblade
martialMelee.description: Durable teeth line the edges of this motorized sword and spin with the force of an industrial chainsaw.

martialMelee.name: Force needle
martialMelee.description: When a full vial of liquid is inserted into the bottom of this weapon’s hilt, it creates an energy needle to hold and inject its payload.

martialMelee.name: Nano-edge rapier
martialMelee.description: The edge of this precision-crafted foil is sharpened to the thickness of a single atom, using regenerating nanites to maintain itself.

martialMelee.name: Painglaive
martialMelee.description: This fierce but deceptively elegant polearm rips apart enemies with a motor-powered fangblade. An adjustable pulse trigger allows the wielder to channel extra pain.

martialMelee.name: Phase cutlass
traits: Modular (S and analog, or V, powered, and tech)
martialMelee.description: A phase cutlass resembles a traditional curved sword until it’s powered. Then its blade morphs into a shimmering void.

martialMelee.name: Plasma doshko
martialMelee.description: Unlike a traditional doshko, this poleaxe uses blades of magnetically stabilized plasma that spin to cleave through multiple enemies with ease.

martialMelee.name: Plasma sword
martialMelee.description: This sword generates a focused beam of plasma around a localized force field powered by a generator in the sword’s hilt.

martialMelee.name: Polyglove
martialMelee.description: This glove features dozens of delicate tools for building or repairing computers. Overclocking it generates voltage between fingertips.

martialMelee.name: Pulse gauntlet
martialMelee.description: Popularized in underground fighting circles, this heavy-duty nanocarbon glove amplifies and weaponizes sounds made by its wielder.

martialMelee.name: Shock truncheon
martialMelee.description: Popular among security forces, this retractable baton discharges electricity with each Strike.

martialMelee.name: Singing spear
traits: Modular (P, analog and thrown 20 ft., or So, boost 1d10, critical (sonic), powered and tech)
martialMelee.description: Classically shaped like an oversized musical note, this spear intones melodious pitches when it strikes.

martialMelee.name: Tailblade
martialMelee.description: Adjustable bands secure this lightweight blade to a tail, tentacle, or similar appendage.

martialMelee.name: Talon
traits: Modular (A, critical (corrosive), tech, or S and analog)
martialMelee.description: This stylized knife tapers into a curved and serrated blade. When powered, it spews a highly corrosive acid.

advancedMelee.name: Disintegration lash
advancedMelee.description: Appearing as an undulating black snake when powered, this whip crackles with red-tinged energy that sunders whatever it strikes.

advancedMelee.name: Grindblade
advancedMelee.description: The edge of this broad-tipped sword is composed of micro-splitting nanoparticles that slice apart targets with surgical precision.

advancedMelee.name: Skyfire sword
advancedMelee.description: Famously wielded by warriors of the Skyfire Legion, this flaming blade is powered by burning gas held in place by magnetic fields.

advancedMelee.name: Thermal dynafan
advancedMelee.description: This warfan is a modified handheld environmental comfort device that changes the pressure in the air to create a frigid chill or a brilliant plume of fire.

simpleRanged.name: Acid dart rifle
simpleRanged.description: Uses compressed air to shoot tiny, chambered darts loaded with components for a highly corrosive compound.

simpleRanged.name: Arc pistol
simpleRanged.description: Instead of traditional ammunition, this bulky pistol contains a capacitor that generates arcs of electricity.

simpleRanged.name: Arc rifle
simpleRanged.description: This rifle’s oversized body contains a larger version of an arc pistol capacitor, with a short barrel and polycarbon stock.

simpleRanged.name: Autotarget rifle
simpleRanged.description: This short, bulky assault rifle incorporates a piston system that allows the user to switch to auto-fire.

simpleRanged.name: Crossbolter
simpleRanged.description: This high-tech crossbow uses a series of pistons to propel bolts along its barrel.

simpleRanged.name: Laser pistol
simpleRanged.description: This compact pistol is the most popular sidearm in the Pact Worlds thanks to its reliability, durability, and affordability.

simpleRanged.name: Laser rifle
simpleRanged.description: These dependable, mass-produced rifles shoot concentrated beams of energy out of square-shaped barrels.

simpleRanged.name: Pulsecaster pistol
simpleRanged.description: This imposing pistol fires a jolt of paralyzing electricity from its barrel.

simpleRanged.name: Reaction breacher
simpleRanged.description: This portable reaction cannon launches flak from miniature cluster missiles that rip through a fortified structure.

simpleRanged.name: Scattergun
simpleRanged.description: A scattergun is a long-barreled firearm that fires numerous spherical projectiles to hit multiple targets.

simpleRanged.name: Seeker rifle
simpleRanged.description: This single-shot sniper rifle is one of the most popular weapons in the Vast thanks to its stability.

simpleRanged.name: Semi-auto pistol
simpleRanged.description: This pistol automatically ejects used cartridges and loads new ammunition after every shot fired.

simpleRanged.name: Sonic rifle
simpleRanged.description: A sonic rifle creates a narrow beam of ultrasound that effectively turns whatever it hits into a speaker.

simpleRanged.name: Zero pistol
simpleRanged.description: Zero pistols use transparent canisters of supercooled liquid as ammunition.

martialRanged.name: Arc emitter
martialRanged.description: Composed of two 4-foot-long protracting rails, this weapon shoots arcs of electricity at targets.

martialRanged.name: Assassin rifle
martialRanged.description: This sniper rifle breaks down into small parts, allowing its wielder to smuggle the weapon without attracting attention.

martialRanged.name: Boom pistol
martialRanged.description: Resembles a megaphone with a trigger, emitting sudden bursts of sound capable of shattering bulletproof glass.

martialRanged.name: Breaching gun
martialRanged.description: This snub-nosed scattergun is commonly used to blast through doors and walls.

martialRanged.name: Coil Rifle
martialRanged.description: The barrel of this rifle is surrounded by a coil that accelerates ammunition with power and accuracy using carefully aligned magnetic fields.

martialRanged.name: Flamethrower
martialRanged.description: This bulky, rifle-shaped weapon spews flames using a tank of highly combustible, pressurized chemicals housed in its stock.

martialRanged.name: Machine gun
martialRanged.description: These proven and reliable automatic weapons are capable of firing in short bursts or completely emptying their magazines.

martialRanged.name: Plasma caster
martialRanged.description: This compact pistol shoots balls of condensed plasma.

martialRanged.name: Rotating pistol
martialRanged.description: A time-tested design favored by traditional gunslingers, the multiple barrels on this pistol mechanically rotate while firing.

martialRanged.name: Rotolaser
martialRanged.description: A rotolaser fires multiple beams of plasma at once. This massive assault rifle has a set of rotating barrels.

martialRanged.name: Shirren-eye rifle
martialRanged.description: This sniper rifle comes with a compound technological scope that allows snipers to adjust focus with natural eye movements.

martialRanged.name: Shuriken drone
martialRanged.description: This star-shaped weapon surrounds a tiny single rotor drone designed to return to its thrower if it doesn’t hit its target.

martialRanged.name: Singing coil
martialRanged.description: Resembling a resonant transformer circuit, this weaponized stringed instrument produces sound by using high-frequency alternating currents.

martialRanged.name: Stellar cannon
martialRanged.description: The rounds of this portable cannon are loaded with carefully positioned mini-missiles packed with flechettes.

martialRanged.name: Zero cannon
martialRanged.description: This triple-barreled cannon’s generator churns rapidly, circulating coolant into a blast of endothermic energy.

advancedRanged.name: Aeon rifle
advancedRanged.description: A mainstay of the Azlanti Star Empire, this sleek laser rifle includes a slot for aeon stones to enhance and focus the intensity of its beams.

advancedRanged.name: Artillery laser
advancedRanged.description: The fast-firing and continuous beams of this laser cannon converge on the target to create enough heat to melt a steel door into slag.

advancedRanged.name: Card slinger
advancedRanged.description: This ceramic weapon sharpens and fires playing cards, such as those from an infinity deck.

advancedRanged.name: Gyrojet pistol
advancedRanged.description: Valued for its stopping power, this pistol sports a large caliber reinforced barrel designed to shoot tiny rockets capable of knocking enemies to the ground.

advancedRanged.name: Magnetar rifle
advancedRanged.description: This rifle uses powerful electromagnets to accelerate simple slugs into deadly, highly accurate projectiles.

advancedRanged.name: Plasma cannon
advancedRanged.description: This long-barreled weapon shoots charges of ionized gas that explode in a blast of superheated plasma.

advancedRanged.name: Screamer
advancedRanged.description: Resembling a large directional speaker held in two hands, a screamer produces a deafening boom.

advancedRanged.name: Starfall pistol
advancedRanged.description: While originally a kit-bashed plasma caster, the commercial models fire streams of superheated plasma.

advancedRanged.name: Streetsweeper
advancedRanged.description: This enormous portable cannon uses speakers to broadcast dense ultrasonic waves powerful enough to sweep a street clean.
